title: Taking a Taxi
description: Practice taking a taxi and giving directions in Chinese
chineseDescription: 練習搭計程車和中文指路對話
objective: Successfully communicate with taxi driver to reach destination
chineseObjective: 成功與計程車司機溝通到達目的地

checkpoints.description: Respond to driver's questions or suggestions
checkpoints.chineseDescription: 回應司機的問題或建議

roles.name: Passenger
roles.systemPrompt: You are a passenger taking a taxi (計程車) in Taiwan. Tell the driver your destination clearly. Give directions if needed. Be polite. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 計程車 not 出租車). Keep responses concise (1-2 sentences).

roles.name: Taxi Driver
roles.systemPrompt: You are a taxi driver (計程車司機) in Taiwan. Confirm the destination, suggest routes, and provide updates. Be friendly and helpful. IMPORTANT: Use Traditional Chinese (Taiwan, 繁體中文) naturally with Taiwan-specific vocabulary (e.g., 計程車 not 出租車/的士). Keep responses concise (1-2 sentences).

passenger.pinyin: nín hǎo, wǒ yào qù tái běi chē zhàn.
passenger.english: Hello, I want to go to Taipei Main Station.

passenger.chinese: 麻煩你，載我到信義區，走快一點的路。
passenger.pinyin: má fán nǐ, zǎi wǒ dào xìn yì qū, zǒu kuài yī diǎn de lù.
passenger.english: Please take me to Xinyi District, take a faster route.

passenger.pinyin: dōu kě yǐ, nǐ jué dìng jiù hǎo.
passenger.english: Either way is fine, you decide.

passenger.pinyin: wǒ shuā kǎ kě yǐ ma?
